name: Soccer Journey
description:
Note: PLEASE TRY TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN IF POSSIBLE! YOU CAN ALSO START DRAGGING FROM WHEREEVER ON THE SCREEN.

I haven't quite adjusted the drag distance yet so you might not be able to get full power if you don't have full screen open!

Description

Start as a young player and work your way to the top and become a World-Class player.

This is a prototype version of the game and will only include one full season in the Premier League (the highest league in the game).

Upcoming versions will include:

  • Ability to play more than one season.
  • Attributes and progression that will tie in with your match performance.
  • Ability to transfer clubs.
  • Getting headhunted by other clubs if you perform well enough.
  • Achievements and milestones that will tie in with the Attribute system.

This project has taken me a long-time to make and I hope you have fun playing it!

Please leave feedback or bugs from your playthrough!

https://twitter.com/shonkykoala

Follow me on Twitter to get progress updates for the game!
